name: The Ordeal of Opening A Door
name_original: The Ordeal of Opening A Door
description:
My contest entry for the Epic Mega Jam 2022.

It's a short game about taking the first step out of your comfort zone. 

The arrow keys control the light below, while the WASD + E (interact) keys control the human above.

Team name: Spiritjammers

Content created before the submission:

Synty Studios - Town Pack

Music by Josef Pres
